NOTE:    It's event for NODES:  it requires to top up balance of the program."},"Message(bytes32,address,bytes,uint128)":{"details":"Emitted when the program sends outgoing message. NOTE:    It's event for USERS:  it informs about new message sent from program."},"MessageQueueingRequested(bytes32,address,bytes,uint128)":{"details":"Emitted when a new message is sent to be queued. NOTE:    It's event for USERS:  it informs about new reply sent from program."},"ReplyQueueingRequested(bytes32,address,bytes,uint128)":{"details":"Emitted when a new reply is sent and requested to be verified and queued. NOTE:    It's event for NODES:  it requires to insert message in the program's queue, if message, exists."},"StateChanged(bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when the state hash of program is changed. NOTE: It's event for USERS: it informs about state changes."},"ValueClaimed(bytes32,uint128)":{"details":"Emitted when a user succeed in claiming value request and receives balance. NOTE:    It's event for USERS:  it informs about value claimed."},"ValueClaimingRequested(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Emitted when a reply's value is requested to be verified and claimed. documentation.text:
@dev Special address to which Sails contract sends messages so that Mirror can decode events:
      https://github.com/gear-tech/sails/blob/master/rs/src/solidity.rs
@dev This nonce is the source for message ids unique generations. Must be bumped on each send. Zeroed nonce is always represent init message by eligible account.
@dev Only the router can call functions marked with this modifier.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "failed to transfer non-zero amount of WVara from source to router"

arguments.value: failed to transfer non-zero amount of WVara from source to router

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "failed to transfer non-zero amount of WVara from source to router"

documentation.text: @dev Non-zero value must be transferred from source to router in functions marked with this modifier.
@dev Functions marked with this modifier can be called only after the program is terminated.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "initializer hasn't created init message yet"

arguments.value: initializer hasn't created init message yet

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "initializer hasn't created init message yet"

documentation.text: @dev Functions marked with this modifier can be called only after the initializer has created the init message.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "initializer hasn't created init message yet; and source is not initializer"

arguments.value: initializer hasn't created init message yet; and source is not initializer

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "initializer hasn't created init message yet; and source is not initializer"

documentation.text: @dev Functions marked with this modifier can be called only after the initializer has created the init message or from the initializer (first access).
@dev Functions marked with this modifier can be called only if the program is active.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "initializer could only be set once"

arguments.value: initializer could only be set once

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "initializer could only be set once"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "isSmall could only be set once"

arguments.value: isSmall could only be set once

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "isSmall could only be set once"

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32) pure returns (struct StorageSlot.AddressSlot storage pointer)
literal_string "abi interface could only be set once"

arguments.value: abi interface could only be set once

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "abi interface could only be set once"

statements.documentation: @dev Verify that the transition belongs to this contract.
@dev Update the state hash if changed.
@dev Return hash of performed state transition.

documentation.text: @dev Value never sent since goes to mailbox.
@dev Tries to parse and emit Sails Event. Returns `true` in case of success and `false` in case of error.
@dev Non-zero value always sent since never goes to mailbox.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Gear.ValueClaim memory) pure returns (bytes memory)

statements.documentation: @dev Transfer all available balance to the inheritor.
@dev Emits an event signaling that the state has changed.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32) pure returns (struct StorageSlot.AddressSlot storage pointer)
